titleStmt.title: Believers mortification of sin by the Holy Spirit, or, Gospel-holiness advanced by the power of the Holy Ghost on the hearts of the faithful to which is added the authors three last sermons, on Gen. 3.15 / by the learned and pious Alexander Carmichael ... ; published by his own copy.
titleStmt.author: Carmichael, Alexander, d. 1676.

notesStmt.note: To the reader signed: Tho. Lye.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
